trans-unit.source: Inserted into a Web page as a placeholder when the attempt to load or create a new instance of a dynamic <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control has failed.
trans-unit.target: Inserito in una pagina Web come segnaposto quando si verifica un errore nel tentativo di caricare o creare una nuova istanza di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> dinamico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class is used by the Web Parts control set as a placeholder for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that could not be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> classe viene utilizzata dal controllo Web part impostato come segnaposto per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo che non è stato possibile aggiungere alla pagina.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control attempts to load or create a new instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone, and the attempt fails for some reason, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> method, and inserts an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control in place of the control that failed.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controllo tenta di caricare o creare una nuova istanza di un dinamico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo in un'area, il tentativo non riesce per qualche motivo, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> chiama quindi il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> (metodo) e inserisce un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controllare al posto di controllo che non è riuscita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control is inserted to preserve previously existing personalization state information that might have existed on a control for users.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controllo viene inserito per conservare le informazioni stato di personalizzazione eventualmente già esistenti in un controllo per gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose there is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that has a personalizable property, so that users can save their own ZIP Code, and then the control can automatically display weather information for that ZIP Code each time the user visits the page.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, si supponga che vi sia un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo che ha una proprietà personalizzabile, in modo che gli utenti possono salvare il proprio codice postale e quindi visualizzare automaticamente informazioni meteo per tale codice ogni volta che l'utente visita la pagina.

trans-unit.source: If at some point a problem occurs with the weather control so that it cannot be loaded during a specific request, and yet the rest of the page does load successfully, the custom personalization data that a user has saved for that control would be lost the next time the personalization data for the page is saved.
trans-unit.target: Se a un certo punto si verifica un problema con il controllo weather in modo che non può essere caricato durante una richiesta specifica e ancora il resto della pagina caricato correttamente, i dati di personalizzazione che un utente è stato salvato per tale controllo andrebbero perso alla successiva esecuzione di perso nalization dati per la pagina viene salvati.

trans-unit.source: By inserting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control in place of the failed control, you can notify the user that a problem has occurred, and also provide a mechanism for the Web Parts control set to preserve the user's personalization data on the failed control until the problem can be corrected.
trans-unit.target: Inserendo il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controllo al posto del controllo non riuscito, è possibile comunicare all'utente che si è verificato un problema e forniscono anche un meccanismo per il controllo di Web part impostato per mantenere i dati di personalizzazione dell'utente nel controllo non riuscito finché il problema è possibile correggere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> class, as one of several types designed to be temporary placeholders for other types.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> deriva dalla classe di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> come uno dei diversi tipi progettati per essere segnaposto temporanei per altri tipi di classe.

trans-unit.source: To create an instance of the class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses its public <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per creare un'istanza della classe, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controllo utilizza pubblici <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> costruttore.

trans-unit.source: The constructor requires several details of the failed control to be passed to it, such as the ID, the original type of the control (if the failed control is a server or user control wrapped in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object), the original path to the source file for the control (if the failed control is a user control), and the ID of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object if present.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore richiede diversi dettagli relativi al controllo non riuscito di essere passati a esso, ad esempio ID, il tipo originale del controllo (se il controllo è un server o il controllo utente di cui è stato eseguito il wrapping in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> oggetto), il percorso originale del file di origine per il controllo ( Se il controllo è un controllo utente) e l'ID di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> oggetto, se presente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class has a single public property called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> classe dispone di una sola proprietà pubblica denominata <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Developers can assign a value to this property that will be displayed in a Web page when the control is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori possono assegnare un valore per questa proprietà che verrà visualizzata in una pagina Web quando viene inserito il controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class has three protected methods.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> classe dispone di tre metodi protetti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method takes style characteristics from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zone that contains the control that failed to load.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> accetta le caratteristiche di stile dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> area che contiene il controllo che non è riuscito a caricare.

trans-unit.source: If any style settings exist in this object, the method applies them to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Se le impostazioni di stile esistano in questo oggetto, il metodo viene applicato per la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> method sets several important inherited properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control, to prevent users from personalizing the control by hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting it, or changing its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> metodo imposta diverse proprietà importanti ereditate nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controllo, per impedire agli utenti di personalizzare il controllo da nascondere, riducendo al minimo, la modifica o l'esportazione o la modifica relativa <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> valore.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> method encodes the value of the string in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property, to prevent rendering problems or scripting attacks.
trans-unit.target: Infine, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> metodo codifica il valore della stringa nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> proprietà, per evitare problemi di rendering o attacchi di script.

trans-unit.source: The conditions in which an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control is actually inserted into a page are relatively rare, and although the class can be inherited from and extended, few developers will find this to be of great importance.
trans-unit.target: Le condizioni in cui un <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllo viene effettivamente inserito in una pagina sono relativamente rari, e anche se la classe può essere ereditata ed estesa, alcuni sviluppatori il valore è di fondamentale importanza.

trans-unit.source: One reason you might want to extend this class is if you want to customize the appearance and behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Un motivo per cui si potrebbe voler estendere questa classe è se si desidera personalizzare l'aspetto e il comportamento del <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllo.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> method, and set additional style or other properties on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, beyond those that are already set.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile eseguire l'override di <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> (metodo) e impostare uno stile aggiuntivo o altre proprietà sul <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> (controllo), oltre a quelli che sono già impostate.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Per richiedere il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controllo da utilizzare un oggetto personalizzato <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllo, è necessario anche ereditare il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> classe ed eseguire l'override relativo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and often passes in a different error message value.
trans-unit.target: In quel metodo, è necessario assegnare il valore del metodo <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parametro per il <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> proprietà personalizzata <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllare, in quanto il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controllo chiama il metodo da diverse altre posizioni e spesso passa un valore di messaggio di errore diverso.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the failing control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta l'ID del controllo non riuscito (non l'ID univoco).

trans-unit.source: If a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control is involved in the failure, the ID is the ID of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Se l'errore interessa un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />, l'ID è quello del relativo controllo server figlio.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the name of the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the failed control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta il nome dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del controllo non riuscito.

trans-unit.source: If a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control is involved in the failure, the type name is the type of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Se l'errore interessa un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />, il nome del tipo è il tipo del relativo controllo server figlio.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to a user control, if a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control that contains a child user control is involved in the failure.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il percorso di un controllo utente, se l'errore interessa un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> che contiene un controllo utente figlio.

trans-unit.source: A string that returns the ID of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> control, if that type of control was involved in the failure to load or create a control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che restituisce l'ID di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />, se tale tipo di controllo era coinvolto nell'errore di caricamento o creazione di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> base class.
trans-unit.target: Tale stringa è necessaria per i controlli che non ereditano dalla classe base <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control when it fails in an attempt to load or create an instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controllo Crea una nuova istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controllare quando non riesce nel tentativo di caricare o creare un'istanza di un dinamico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Dynamic controls are controls that are added to a page programmatically, or by a user who adds the control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Controlli dinamici sono controlli che vengono aggiunti a una pagina a livello di codice o da un utente che aggiunge il controllo da un catalogo di controlli, a differenza dei controlli statici che vengono dichiarati nel markup della pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> method simply creates an instance of the base class, passing to it the four parameters that contain information about the failed control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> metodo crea semplicemente un'istanza della classe base, passando i quattro parametri che contengono informazioni sul controllo non riuscito.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that contains the HTML output to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> contenente l'output HTML di cui eseguire il rendering.

trans-unit.source: Applies special error style attributes to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> object that is inserted into a page in place of another control.
trans-unit.target: Applica attributi speciali di stile di errore a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> inserito in una pagina al posto di un altro controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method takes the style characteristics (if any) that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> accetta le caratteristiche di stile (se presente) che sono definiti nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> area che contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The styles are applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control prior to rendering.
trans-unit.target: Gli stili vengono applicati per la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controllo prima del rendering.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in a derived <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> class, if developers want to customize the style characteristics that are applied to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo può essere sottoposto a override in una classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> classe, se gli sviluppatori che desiderano personalizzare le caratteristiche di stile applicate a un <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllo.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Per richiedere il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controllo da utilizzare un oggetto personalizzato <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllo, è necessario anche ereditare il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> classe ed eseguire l'override relativo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
trans-unit.target: In quel metodo, è necessario assegnare il valore del metodo <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parametro per il <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> proprietà personalizzata <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllare, in quanto il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controllo chiama il metodo da diverse altre posizioni e passa in genere un messaggio di errore specifico.

trans-unit.source: Sets several important properties on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control prior to rendering, to prevent users from being able to personalize the control.
trans-unit.target: Consente di impostare diverse proprietà importanti sul controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> prima del rendering, per impedire che gli utenti possano personalizzarlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> method sets properties on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control before it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> metodo imposta le proprietà di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controllare prima del rendering.

trans-unit.source: These properties prevent users from hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting the control, or changing its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Queste proprietà impediscono agli utenti di nascondere, riducendo al minimo, la modifica, o l'esportazione del controllo o la modifica relativa <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> valore.

trans-unit.source: However, users can close or delete an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control instance.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile chiudere o eliminare un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> istanza del controllo.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in an inherited <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo può essere sottoposto a override in un'ereditato <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Developers might want to override the method to set additional properties on the control, such as a default <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori desiderano eseguire l'override del metodo per impostare proprietà aggiuntive sul controllo, ad esempio un predefinito <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Per richiedere il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controllo da utilizzare un oggetto personalizzato <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllo, è necessario anche ereditare il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> classe ed eseguire l'override relativo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
trans-unit.target: In quel metodo, è necessario assegnare il valore del metodo <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parametro per il <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> proprietà personalizzata <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllare, in quanto il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controllo chiama il metodo da diverse altre posizioni e passa in genere un messaggio di errore specifico.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message that is displayed in a Web page in place of a control that could not be successfully added to the page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il messaggio di errore visualizzato in una pagina Web al posto di un controllo che non è stato possibile aggiungere alla pagina.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il testo del messaggio di errore.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a culture-specific error message.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è un messaggio di errore specifico delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property can be assigned a value by a developer, so that a custom error message is displayed at the point where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control is inserted into a page.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> proprietà può essere assegnata un valore da uno sviluppatore, in modo che viene visualizzato un messaggio di errore personalizzato nel punto in cui il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> controllo viene inserito in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Developers can assign a default value to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property by extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> class and, in the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> constructor or in an overridden <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> method, assigning a default value to the property.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori possono assegnare un valore predefinito per il <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> proprietà estendendo il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> classe e, nel <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> costruttore o in un override <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> (metodo), assegnando un valore predefinito per la proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To require the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control to use a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you must also inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class and override its <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Per richiedere il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controllo da utilizzare un oggetto personalizzato <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllo, è necessario anche ereditare il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> classe ed eseguire l'override relativo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property of your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
trans-unit.target: In quel metodo, è necessario assegnare il valore del metodo <paramref name="errorMessage" /> parametro per il <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> proprietà personalizzata <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> controllare, in quanto il <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> controllo chiama il metodo da diverse altre posizioni e passa in genere un messaggio di errore specifico.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that encodes the error message.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> che consente di codificare il messaggio di errore.

trans-unit.source: Encodes the string value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Consente di codificare il valore stringa della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> method encodes the string assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property to ensure that it renders properly, and to protect against script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> metodo consente di codificare la stringa assegnata al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> proprietà per assicurarsi che esegue il rendering correttamente e per la protezione da attacchi intrusivi nel codice script.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene aggiunto solo per implementare l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene aggiunto solo per implementare l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" />.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface and calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> e chiama il metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene aggiunto solo per implementare l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control tracks the status of its changes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il controllo tiene traccia dello stato delle relative modifiche.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Web Parts control is responsible for determining when the control is considered changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il controllo Web part è responsabile di determinare quando il controllo è considerato modificato. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.
